positive.name: add one point to a characteristic
flavor: One of your characteristics is greater than before.
effects: Add one point to a single characteristic.
restrictions: Strength, Dexterity, Agility, and Constitution cannot be increased to higher than 11 though this trait.
Intelligence, Focus, Willpower, and Perception cannot be increased to more than 13 using this trait.

positive.name: ambidextrous
flavor: You can use both hands equally well.
effects: You can perform maneuvers with either hand. In combat, you suffer only -1 to attacks with an additional weapon with the Offhand Attack Action.

items: You have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned}, and you have resistance to poison damage.
You don't need to eat, drink, or breathe.
You don't need to sleep and don't suffer the effects of exhaustion due to lack of rest, and magic can't put you to sleep.

negative.name: bad luck
flavor: You have very bad luck in doing whatever you set out to do; you fail much more than you would like.
effects: The number required for a Fumble increases by one. Fumble can now occur on a double two. If you gain mastery in a skill, you only Fumble on double one.
